SkillsSubtitleBuildText: Developing: it’s creating, conceiving/designing, coding, testing and integrating an IT solution for a client.
SkillsSubtitleBuildTextRainbow: Conception/creation of a weather app enabling the display of weather data and allowing to search and add favorites.
SkillsSubtitleBuildTextGraphMapAnaysis: Conception of a tool allowing to visualize graphs, types of geographic locations and the link between them.
SkillsSubtitleBuildTextTchoutchou: Conception of an ERP adapted to the management of a railway network.
SkillsSubtitleImproveText: To propose IT apps optimized according to specific criteria: time of execution, precision, consumption of resources.
SkillsSubtitleImproveTextDirectory: To optimize data sorting depending on the size and the complexity of the data set.
SkillsSubtitleImproveTextGraphMapAnaysis: To carry out a research journey with the most efficient graph of geographic locations with the most relevant result.
SkillsSubtitleAdministerText: To install, to set up, to provide, to maintain structures, units and networks in operational conditions, to optimize an organization IT system.
SkillsSubtitleAdministerTextNetwork: To install and set up a local network. To set up a DNS. To deploy an Apache web server on and local and then public network.
SkillsSubtitleManageText: To design/conceive, to manage and exploit company’s data and providing all information for a good company management.
SkillsSubtitleManageTextDatabase: To deploy an Oracle data base. Conception of data, routines, views and procedures.
SkillsSubtitleManageTextTchoutchou: To administer an Oracle data base linked to an ERP web. Conception of a data set. Implementation of routines, views and procedures.
SkillsSubtitleDriveText: To satisfy users’ needs regarding the client’s value chain. To organize and manage an IT project with classic or agile methodology.
SkillsSubtitleDriveTextTchoutchou: To carry out a project using an agile methodology (SCRUM). Respect of agile customs (sprints, retrospectives, etc.) Task planning and project monitoring during several months.
SkillsSubtitleTeamworkingText: To acquire, to develop and to exploit necessary capacities/abilities to work efficiently in a IT team.
SkillsSubtitleTeamworkingTextTeamwork: Familiarization with the dynamic of development team. Pondering about the work methods, the conflict management and the organization to adopt.
AboutSummary: Actually student in informatic Bachelor at IUT Lyon 1, I am also a graduate of the National qualification of Aquatic Security and Rescue which allows me to work as a seasonal lifeguard but also to be a volunteer at the French Red Cross.
AboutTimelineNextChallenge: What will be the next challenge ?
ExperienceLifeguardManagerResume: As station manager, oversee the beach, identify bathers in difficulty and intervene if necessary. Also delimit bathing areas and ensure compliance with safety rules. Ensure the safe operation of canadairs near bathing areas.
ExperienceDLUSAMS: Local Assistant Director of First Aid Missions
DegreeBUTInfo: University Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science
